alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marinette, northeastern Menominee, northern Oconto and east central Langlade Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardner Dam Scout Camp, or 25 miles east of Antigo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mountain around 630 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include South Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Menominee; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
